ch.akuhn.matrix

Class Vector

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.akuhn.matrix.Vector
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DenseVector, SparseVector

    public abstract class Vector
extends Object
    An ordered list of floating point numbers.
    Author:
    Adrian Kuhn
